b2eb8432-1f75-4f2f-839b-5654053147c4.description: CHAP Accreditation demonstrates this organization meets the industry’s highest nationally recognized Home Health standards. The rigorous evaluation by CHAP focuses on structure and function, quality of services and products, human and financial resources and long-term viability. Adherence to CHAP’s Standards leads to better quality care.
b2eb8432-1f75-4f2f-839b-5654053147c4.name: CHAP Seal of Accreditation - Home Health

issuer.summary: issued by CHAP | Community Health Accreditation Partner

alignments.name: CHAP Standards of Excellence
alignments.description: CHAP Standards of Excellence are designed to help organizations deliver the best care and services possible. To support organizational excellence, CHAP has developed standards that are easy to understand, relevant and practical.

badge_template_activities.title: Organizations that achieve CHAP Accreditation may have also been deemed to meet the Medicare Conditions of Participation and is certified as a Medicare provider. Based on the findings of the site visit conducted, at the location and service referenced above, the organization is found to be in compliance with the CHAP Standards of Excellence. The CHAP Board of Review has granted Accreditation for the term of three (3) years.
CHAP’s accreditation process is easy and straightforward. Get started immediately with our online tools that remove the guesswork and minimize disruption to your business.

b089de76-73ee-4cce-aeb0-5b789717f87d.description: This organization has achieved CHAP Verified status, granted to tools and resources used by community-based care providers that, through rigorous inspection, show no roadblocks to executing the CHAP Standards of Excellence, and innovate to improve the delivery of high quality care.
b089de76-73ee-4cce-aeb0-5b789717f87d.name: CHAP Certified Consultant

issuer.summary: issued by CHAP | Community Health Accreditation Partner

badge_template_activities.title: CHAP Certified Consultants have passed CHAP’s competency requirements and adhere to CHAP’s standards for consulting. Consultants must renew this distinction every three (3) years through continued education and practice in their specialty. CHAP does not provide guidance for operating as a consultant and does not endorse any specific consultant or consulting firm. Using any consultant or consulting firm listed in this resource does not guarantee accreditation by CHAP.

6da22515-9ff0-43c1-b4e8-7ee4835b6251.description: Earners of the CHHPO© badge demonstrate an understanding of compliance standards in home health care and apply knowledge in current organizational role. Earners understand and implement quality improvement metrics, evaluate leadership skills and apply new knowledge in day-to-day activities, analyze workforce management needs and employee engagement tactics. They also apply fiscal management skills, and increase knowledge of ethically appropriate business development strategies.
6da22515-9ff0-43c1-b4e8-7ee4835b6251.name: Certified Home Health Professional Operator©

issuer.summary: issued by CHAP | Community Health Accreditation Partner

badge_template_activities.title: This two-and-a-half-day, hands-on, skill-based workshop focuses on giving you all the tools you need for Home Health operational excellence with a goal of patient-centered care. Successful completion of the workshop and testing results in your certification as a Certified Home Health Professional Operator© (CHHPO©).
CHHPO© (Certified Home Health Professional Operator©)

8d3e85d3-2a0a-452f-82f6-d7105baa2335.description: Earners of the CHSP© demonstrate an understanding of industry innovations and related regulations, effectively demonstrate sales model, articulates a value proposition that inspires action, manages referral objections, and builds long lasting, value-based trust with referral sources.
8d3e85d3-2a0a-452f-82f6-d7105baa2335.name: Certified Healthcare Sales Professional©

issuer.summary: issued by CHAP | Community Health Accreditation Partner

badge_template_activities.title: This two-and-a-half-day, hands-on, skill-based workshop will focus on improving your sales techniques and growing your agency census with integrity. Successful completion of the workshop and testing results in your certification as a CHAP Certified Healthcare Sales Professional© (CHSP©).
CHSP© (Certified Healthcare Sales Professional©)

CE’s – Attendees have the opportunity to earn 18 credit hours by attending. Texas Note: As a nationally recognized organization, CHAP’s workshops qualify under the Texas Administrative Codes §558.259 and §558.260 for Initial Educational Training and Continuing Education in Administration of Agencies.

e2a197f1-2b74-405e-9ff3-889dc425fb08.description: Earners of the CHPO© badge demonstrate an understanding of compliance standards in hospice care and apply knowledge in current organizational role. Earners can understand and implement quality improvement metrics, evaluate leadership skills and apply new knowledge in day-to-day activities. They also identify trends and best practices in workforce management, apply fiscal management skills, and increase knowledge of ethically appropriate business development strategies.
e2a197f1-2b74-405e-9ff3-889dc425fb08.name: Certified Hospice Professional Operator©

issuer.summary: issued by CHAP | Community Health Accreditation Partner

badge_template_activities.title: This two-and-a-half-day, hands-on, skill-based workshop focuses on giving you all the tools you need for Hospice operational excellence with a goal of patient-centered care. Successful completion of the workshop and testing results in your certification as a Certified Hospice Professional Operator© (CHPO©).
CHPO© (Certified Hospice Professional Operator©)

CE’s – 18 Nursing Continuing Education credits. Attendees have the opportunity to earn 18 credit hours by attending. Texas Note: As a nationally recognized organization, CHAP’s workshops qualify under the Texas Administrative Codes §558.259 and §558.260 for Initial Educational Training and Continuing Education in Administration of Agencies.

badge_template_activities.title: CHAP Verified status is granted to products, tools, and resources used by community-based care providers that, through rigorous inspection, show no roadblocks to executing the CHAP Standards of Excellence, and innovate to improve the delivery of high-quality care. b1a4eadd-9648-400c-8d08-04b547fc7b9e.description: This organization has been shown to meet or exceed the evidence-based Standards set forth by CHAP's Board of Physicians for providing exceptional care for Heart Failure. These Standards include provision of care and transition of care requirements, self-management requirements, infection prevention and control, performance improvement requirements, information management requirements, management of the certification program.
